headline: AeroVironment Set to Join S&P MidCap 400; Victory Capital Holdings to Join S&P SmallCap 600
summary: AeroVironment Inc. (NASD: AVAV) will replace ChampionX Corp. (NASD: CHX) in the S&P MidCap 400, and Victory Capital Holdings Inc. (NASD: VCTR) will replace AeroVironment in the S&P SmallCap 600 effective prior to the opening of trading on Friday, July 18. S&P 500 constituent Schlumberger Ltd. (NYSE: SLB) is acquiring ChampionX in a deal expected to be completed July 16, pending final closing conditions.

headline: S&P Global Inc. (SPGI): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on S&P Global on FluentInQuality’s Substack. As of 14ᵗʰ July, S&P Global’s share was trading at $530.12. SPGI’s trailing and forward P/E were 41.68 and 31.54 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. S&P Global is not a market-facing stock like others; it operates quietly as the essential infrastructure of modern […]

headline: Wall Street Lunch: June CPI Shows Tariff Impact On Prices
summary: A mixed retail inflation report indicated that tariffs are starting to have upward pressure on prices.

headline: S&P Global and Anthropic Announce Integration of S&P Global's Trusted Financial Data into Claude
summary: S&P Global (NYSE: SPGI) today announced a collaboration with Anthropic to bring S&P Global's trusted financial data into Claude by Anthropic. This integration enables financial professionals to answer complex financial questions and get fast, reliable answers grounded in trusted data from S&P Global via Claude.
